GSD.description:
staging: vchiq_arm: Avoid NULL ptr deref in vchiq_dump_platform_instances

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.34 by commit 176df12b38c70b0a45e6392a0ee5bc83489dfc29. For more details please see the references link.
